lead_paragraph: MADRICK--Cora, born in Manila on January 21, 1925, died peacefully in her sleep on July 12, 2016 in Cambridge, MA. She was married to Milton Madrick, of New York City, who died in 2007. Many have written about how special a person she was. She will be deeply missed. She is survived by her three loving children and their spouses, Jeff and Kim, Robert and Judy, and Lynne and Michael; her devoted brother Tony and his wife Annie; her eight grandchildren, Laura and her husband Mark, Johanna, Matina and her husband Matthew, Erik, Christopher, Dylan, Jake, Emma; and her six great-grandchildren, Malcolm, Cadence, Samantha, Harrison, Emiliano and August. Services will be held in early August at the Ascension Church and Trinity Cemetery in New York City. 1/3
